data.title: 80+ COMPONENTS
data.description: The most complete set of native widgets featuring 80+ easy to use components for all your UI requirements.

data.title: OPEN SOURCE
data.description: Hosted at GitHub, all widgets are open source and free to use under MIT license. Feel the power of open source.

data.title: THEMES
data.description: Donâ€™t get tied up in just one look&feel. Choose from a variety of options including material and bootstrap design.

data.title: TEMPLATES
data.description: Professionally designed highly customizable PrimeReact application templates to get started in no time.

data.title: ACCESSIBILITY
data.description: Fully accessible and in compliance with Section 508 standards.

data.title: PRO SUPPORT
data.description: With the exclusive services of Pro account, you no longer need to post your questions in the community forum and your issues to community issue tracker.

data.title: PRODUCTIVITY
data.description: Allocate your valuable time on business logic rather than dealing with the complex user interface requirements.

data.title: COMMUNITY
data.description: Join PrimeReact community to become a part of an active, vibrant and growing open source foundation.

data.title: MOBILE
data.description: Enhanced mobile user experience with touch optimized responsive design elements.
